title: (x) Amore hybrid grunge script - Hurricane Supa Dupa Serif {Rainer}
content:
im looking for this font and i was hoping you guys could help me.  
thanks in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [f1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130717154849/http:/typophile.com/files/f1.jpg) | 22.3 KB |
author: asher

comments.content: I <cite>think</cite> it's a hybrid of [Porcelain and Selfish](http://web.archive.org/web/20130717154849/http:/www.misprintedtype.com/v3/fonts.php)...
Yep, I'm sure now. And thanks to Yves for drawing my attention to Misprinted Type [only this morning](http://web.archive.org/web/20130717154849/http:/typophile.com/node/33636)! :)

Yepp, Stephen, you are right it looks like a combination of these fonts. And it is called [Hurricane Supa Dupa Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130717154849/http:/www.dafont.com/hurricane-supadupas.font?text=Amore).
What?! Wow! Can you do that? Isn't that, like, cheating? Or something?

<cite>What?! Wow! Can you do that? Isn’t that, like, cheating? Or something?</cite>

Mhhh … I think that's why the author removed the download from his [own site](http://web.archive.org/web/20130717154849/http:/typo.xero.nu/) and set it to »private«.

Quote: _»go get yerself some real fonts at misprintedtype.«_
